name: Product Development Studio
description: End-to-end environment for building products through empathy mapping, value proposition design, MVP prototyping, and lean canvas planning.

name: AI Collaboration Hub
description: Chat-first workspace where teams collaborate with AI assistants across Telegram, Discord, and Slack with persistent context and memory.

name: Visual Canvas Workspace
description: Collaborative whiteboard and canvas for real-time ideation, cursors, comments, and visual project exploration.

name: Strategy Observatory
description: Analytics and insights dashboard tracking team progress, project health, predictions, and AI-augmented strategic recommendations.
